results.deck: Utilizing similar gameplay mechanics as previous Metal Slug games, Metal Slug 4 stays true to the series, but also manages to keep things fresh with new bosses, weapons, vehicles, and a combo system.
results.name: Metal Slug 4

results.deck: Freestyle MetalX is a Free Roaming, Trick Based MotoCross Game.
results.name: Freestyle MetalX

results.deck: Enclave is a third-person action-adventure game which takes place in a medieval fantasy realm in a world which has been torn apart by magic and evil. It was released on the Xbox in the summer of 2002, and later on the PC early in spring of 2003.
results.name: Enclave

results.deck: A remake of the original Fable featuring additional quests, armor, weapons, and explorable areas.
results.name: Fable: The Lost Chapters

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 5 is the fifth instalment in the popular sports games series. The game was the first in the series to feature online network play.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 5

results.deck: The fourth Pro Skater game changes up the single-player structure, while making some tweaks and additions to the established skating gameplay.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4

results.deck: Take control of Wolverine as he uncovers his own dark past and tries to find the cure to the deadly Shiva virus.
results.name: X2: Wolverine's Revenge

results.deck: 22 Capcom games in one giant collection for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox.
results.name: Capcom Classics Collection

results.deck: Video game tie-in to 2006 Winter Olympic Games in Torino.
results.name: Torino 2006

results.deck: In this simulation game players assume control of a theme park, where they can add new rides, manage the park's upkeep, and even design their very own roller coasters.
results.name: RollerCoaster Tycoon

results.deck: LMA Manager 2004 is the fifth game in the LMA Manager series. It introduced a new menu interface and a Fantasy Team mode.
results.name: LMA Manager 2004

results.deck: Crime is everywhere on the streets of New York City. As Frank "the Punisher" Castle, it is your job to clean them up. However, there seem to be bigger things at hand...
results.name: The Punisher

results.deck: Nitro Kart takes Crash Bandicoot and friends to the streets in this kart-racer with multiple tracks and characters to choose from.
results.name: Crash Nitro Kart

results.deck: The sequel to Project Gotham Racing introduced online play and a plethora of content, while still maintaining its focus on driving with style.
results.name: Project Gotham Racing 2

results.deck: A Robotech themed game based on the Third Robotech War.  It was a shooter that allowed the player to take on a human form or transform into a motorcycle to fight the invading Invid on all fronts.
results.name: Robotech: Invasion

results.deck: Strike Force Bowling is a budget bowling title for Xbox, PS2, and GameCube.
results.name: Strike Force Bowling

results.deck: Thief: Deadly Shadows is the third game in the Thief Franchise. It continues the exploits of series protagonist and master thief, Garrett, in a fantasy world that merges elements of the late medieval era with the Victorian age.
results.name: Thief: Deadly Shadows

results.deck: The Ghost Recon team must enter Mexico City and prevent a coup d'Ã©tat led by rebel Mexican forces.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter

results.deck: Remedy's film-noir action game puts players in the role of grizzled cop Max Payne as he tries to clear his name of murder.
results.name: Max Payne

results.deck: Funcom's long-awaited follow-up to the point-and-click adventure, The Longest Journey. Dreamfall depicts three unique characters who live apparently disparate lives, but whose stories are intertwined, along with the fate of two worlds.
results.name: Dreamfall: The Longest Journey

results.deck: NHL Hitz Pro is a licensed ice hockey game, released in September 2003 for the Playstation 2, Xbox and Nintendo Gamecube.
results.name: NHL Hitz Pro

results.deck: Full Spectrum Warrior: Ten Hammers is the sequel to Pandemic's modern war game, which allows players to lead mechanized infantry units and engage in multiplayer tactical combat.
results.name: Full Spectrum Warrior: Ten Hammers

results.deck: Sequel to one of the most famous games of all time, The Sims 2 introduces a new engine and many new gameplay features to the franchise.
results.name: The Sims 2

results.deck: Indigo Prophecy is a mystery-driven action/adventure game that harkens back to the point-and-click era. The game incorporates rhythm mini-games at key points as you try to figure out why you murdered a stranger in a local diner.
results.name: Indigo Prophecy

results.deck: Tom, Jerry and friends go for an all out war in this four player fighter.
results.name: Tom and Jerry: War of the Whiskers

results.deck: Get all the Shen Gong Wu as your favorite Xiaolin Showdown characters based on the Kids WB Cartoon of the same name!
results.name: Xiaolin Showdown

results.deck: An American college basketball game.
results.name: ESPN College Hoops 2K5

results.deck: Aggressive Inline takes the gameplay of the Tony Hawk series and applies it to inline skating, adding in an innovative skill progression system for good measure.
results.name: Aggressive Inline

results.deck: Follow the story of John Anderton in this action game loosely based on the events of the feature film.
results.name: Minority Report: Everybody Runs

results.deck: The first game in the Halo series of sci-fi first-person shooters. Halo: Combat Evolved is considered largely responsible for pioneering console shooters.
results.name: Halo: Combat Evolved

results.deck: An insane roster of characters from both Marvel and Capcom battles out in crazy 3-on-3 tag-team matches in the fourth installment of the Marvel vs. Capcom series.
results.name: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes

results.deck: Transworld Surf is a surfing game comparable to the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series, but for surfing. The player can choose from a number of surfers and various spots around the world to test their surfing skills.
results.name: TransWorld SURF

results.deck: Destroy All Monsters Melee brings 12 classic Toho movie monsters monsters to life to save or destroy the world. The game features both a story mode and a multiplayer 'Melee' mode, where up to four players can go head-to-head.
results.name: Godzilla: Destroy All Monsters Melee

results.deck: Teen Titans game is the 2nd Teen Titans game made, and has the 5 main Teen Titans members from the TV Series which it is based on: Robin, Cyborg, Raven, Starfire, and Beast Boy.
results.name: Teen Titans

results.deck: Developed by Double Fine Productions, Psychonauts is a platforming action-adventure game in which players take on the role of Razputin, a young psychic out to thwart an evil plot to subvert the minds of other powerful psychics.
results.name: Psychonauts

results.deck: XIII is a cel-shaded first-person shooter based on the comic book of the same name, which was in turn inspired by Robert Ludlum's book The Bourne Identity.
results.name: XIII

results.deck: The popular Parker Brothers board game has been released on nearly every home console available, and many of them include several "house rules" to spruce up the fun.
results.name: Monopoly

results.deck: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age is a role-playing game depicting the adventures of the "Shadow Fellowship," a group of unknowns following in the footsteps of the Fellowship of the Ring.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age

results.deck: Set in the 1980's during the height of the Cold War, players must escape from a Russian complex where American journalist Matt Carter has been captured.
results.name: Cold War

results.deck: Namco Museum is a collection of arcade games made by Namco.
results.name: Namco Museum

results.deck: Dead to Rights is an action game by Namco that puts you in the shoes of Jack Slate, a fugitive cop who's been framed for murder.
results.name: Dead to Rights

results.deck: Conflict: Desert Storm places you in the shoes of four SAS or Delta Force specialists as you are tasked with spearheading the assault on Iraq as they invade Kuwait.
results.name: Conflict: Desert Storm

results.deck: Hop in to the shoes of two McPherson's on an investigation that takes place in two different centuries in this sequel to 2003's Post Mortem.
results.name: Still Life

results.deck: It's up to the Simpsons cast to save Springfield in this open-world driving game.
results.name: The Simpsons: Hit & Run

results.deck: Nightcaster: Defeat the Darkness is an RPG/Action hybrid game where you take control of Arran. Accompanied by a sentient, magic orb, Arran casts many spells to defeat his enemies, eventually facing off against the devious Nightcaster himself.
results.name: Nightcaster: Defeat the Darkness

results.deck: Digimon Rumble Arena 2 (Digimon Battle Chronicle in Japan) is a Digimon fighting game released in 2004 by Bandai Games for the GameCube, PlayStation 2, and the Xbox.
results.name: Digimon Rumble Arena 2

results.deck: Turok:  Evolution is a re-imagining of the acclaimed first person shooter series for Xbox, PS2 and GCN.  Many fans say this entry, however, fails to live up to the standard set by its predecessors.
results.name: Turok: Evolution

results.deck: Call of Duty: Finest Hour, developed by Spark Unlimited and Kuju Entertainment, was the first Call of Duty game to appear on home consoles and remains a console exclusive.
results.name: Call of Duty: Finest Hour

results.deck: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction is a video game based on the popular British Game show where home made robots would fight with the aim of imobilising their opponent(s)
results.name: Robot Wars: Arenas of Destruction

results.deck: Fable is the first game in the Fable franchise, following the exploits of an unnamed Hero as he struggles to free Albion from the evil Jack Of Blades. Fable features a moral choice system, where your appearance changes depending on your actions.
results.name: Fable

results.deck: In the year 2219, there will be a wildly popular disc-based sport where gangs brutally fight and compete to score. The game is known as Blitz.
results.name: Deathrow

results.deck: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown is a game based on the popular movie starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence.
results.name: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown

results.deck: Mike Tyson's third official boxing game.
results.name: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing

results.deck: Ãon Flux is a game based on the 2005 film, which is based on the cartoon series of the same name. You play as Ãon Flux, the top operative of a government rebellion, on her mission to kill a government leader.
results.name: Ãon  Flux

results.deck: True Crime: New York City is the sequel to True Crime: Streets of L.A., and is universally considered to be significantly inferior to the original game, with a worse framerate, dumber AI, and bugs that weren't present in L.A.
results.name: True Crime: New York City

results.deck: The prequel to the entire Samurai Shodown series, created after Playmore's acquisition of SNK, completely revamps the button layout again (adding a new Dodge button, bringing back the second game's maneuvers for good use).
results.name: Samurai Shodown V

results.deck: Blinx 2: Masters of Time and Space is the sequel to Blinx the Time Sweeper.
results.name: Blinx 2: Masters of Time and Space

results.deck: Shin Megami Tensei: NINE was published by Atlus and released on Xbox, exclusively in Japan, in 2002.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: NINE

results.deck: A Rugby League game titled depending upon each region's league (NRL for Australia, Super League for the UK). It contained Club teams from both Australia and Britain, as well as international teams.
results.name: NRL Rugby League

results.deck: The Guy Game is a simple, adult-oriented trivia game that became infamous when it was revealed that one of the girls who appeared nude in the game was underage, and the game was technically considered child pornography by American law.
results.name: The Guy Game

results.deck: Max Payne 2 is a film-noir action game in which the player takes control of Max Payne, in search of the murdering group masquerading as cleaners.
results.name: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne

results.deck: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions is a driving/car combat game that involves two unique storylines in which you play as two female cops and two male spies, both duos enemies of the Yakuza.
results.name: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions

results.deck: The sequel to Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30, Earned in Blood lets you take control of Sergeant "Red" Hartsock as you lead your comrades in this World War 2 shooter.
results.name: Brothers in Arms: Earned in Blood

results.deck: Ricochet Lost Worlds is a breakout style game with 15 different power-ups and a robust level editor.
results.name: Ricochet Lost Worlds

results.deck: Return to James Bond's roots in the video game interpretation of the 1963 film From Russia With Love, featuring the likeness and voice acting of Sean Connery.
results.name: 007: From Russia with Love

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06 is the series debut on the Xbox 360. The game featured upgraded visuals and gameplay elements on the Xbox 360, but suffered from glitches and inaccessible achievements.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06

results.deck: Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee is the third game in the Oddworld series and the second in the Oddworld Quintology. It brings a new playable character (Munch), 3D visuals and a bunch of new enemies and locations.
results.name: Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee

results.deck: Whacked is a bizarre game show video game that was one of the first games to support Xbox Live.
results.name: Whacked!

results.deck: A platformer released across multiple platforms to accompany the release of the 2004 movie of the same name
results.name: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events

results.deck: B.J. returns to Europe to fight the Nazis and the results of their new experiments. Original game is unlocked on completion of the campaign mode.
results.name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Tides of War

results.deck: The third release in the GTA Franchise stars silent criminal protagonist Claude, who after having been betrayed and left for dead is out for revenge.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto III

results.deck: Obscure is a survival horror game set in an American high school with such notable features as two player co-op and the ability to combine items.
results.name: Obscure

results.deck: Fight for NY continues the story from Def Jam Vendetta while adding in new characters, venues, and gameplay elements.
results.name: Def Jam: Fight for NY

results.deck: Officer Nick Mason and the T-Zero riot response team fight against the Burners, a gang of maniacs who have pushed their city to the edge. Riot Response is an FPS with a focus on fast action and disaster movie-styled set-pieces.
results.name: Urban Chaos: Riot Response

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 5 is a hack and slash video game set in China and the fifth installment in the Dynasty Warriors series. It is based on the Chinese novel "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luo Guanzhong.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 5

results.deck: Based after the film of the same name, which was named after, but not based on, the comic book character of the same name, this tie-in game sees Patience Phillips gain a set of feline superpowers and use them to defeat an evil makeup designer.
results.name: Catwoman

results.deck: A prisoner escapes from the wizard prison Azkaban, and he goes after Harry.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

results.deck: Control Eike Kusch as he attempts to change the course of history and stop a mysterious figure from killing him.
results.name: Shadow of Destiny

results.deck: The Suffering is a freeware action-oriented horror game.
results.name: The Suffering

results.deck: Originally developed as a third game in the Deus Ex series. Project: Snowblind is a futuristic sci-fi first person shooter featuring numerous futuristic weapons and abilities.
results.name: Project: Snowblind

results.deck: Vrrrooom. That's the sound of a motorcycle.
results.name: Jacked

results.deck: A New Beginning is the first of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. The dragons are at war with the Malefor. The fate of the dragons lies in the hopes of the prophecy of the purple dragon. Spyro must fight the forces of Malefor and a black dragon named Cynder.
results.name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning

results.deck: A budget title with stealth-action similar to the original Splinter Cell and a cover system similar to kill.switch.
results.name: Special Forces: Nemesis Strike

results.deck: Mobile Light Force 2, as with the first Mobile Light Force with which it shared an almost identical cover, is famous for being a poorly dubbed, poorly translated and poorly received version of a Japanese shoot-'em-up. In this case, Shikigami no Shiro.
results.name: Mobile Light Force 2

results.deck: Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter is an arcade style air combat game, featuring a nimble Jedi starfighter with force powers, and a high tech bomber.
results.name: Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter

results.deck: MX Unleashed is a dirt-bike game that features races, a free-roam freestyle mode, and the ability to drive other vehicles.
results.name: MX Unleashed

results.deck: Phantom Crash is an Xbox game developed by Genki Co. In a future, cyberpunk Tokyo, the most popular sport is Rumbling, where people battle in small mechs called SVs. The player assumes the role of a newbie Rumbler set on reaching the top.
results.name: Phantom Crash

results.deck: Take on the role of a redneck driving an 18 wheeler.
results.name: Big Mutha Truckers

results.deck: Yakko, Wakko and Dot are out from the confines of the Warner Bros. tower once more, in this late sixth-gen title.
results.name: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt

results.deck: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is an action role-playing game that is based on the book of the same name.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

results.deck: It's a soccer game!
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2003
